name: Cursed Deals!
description:
You're a witch who made a deal with capitalism (literally), and now you owe rent to Mr.Capital.  Make deals with the local townsfolk who are desperate to get rid of their curses and gain as much profit as possible to avoid getting an eviction notice from your tower.

The game has 5 endings based on how much karma or money that you have.

Controls:

  • Z To Quickly Make a deal.
  • X to reject a deal
  • C to ask for more money.
  • V to ask for less money.
  • W / S to increase/decrease the money that will be asked.
  • Right Click / Space to continue through the dialogue.

NOTICE:

There is a known issue with the day timer not working properly on the second day and ending abruptly. I wish I could fix it, but I ran out of time and I have no idea how to personally fix it.

There is no HTML web build due to Mono Godot 4 not supporting Web exports yet.
